dn23:2.6: vuddho → vudho (bj) | buddho (s1-3, km, mr) | vuḍḍho (pts1)
dn23:2.8: yena siṃsapāvanaṃ → yena sīsapāvanaṃ (s1-3, km) | tenu­pasaṃ­kamanti (pts1)
dn23:3.7: arahā cā’ti → arahā ca (s1-3, km, mr)
dn23:7.7: rathikāya rathikaṃ → rathiyāya rathiyaṃ (bahūsu), karitvā → kāretvā (bj, s1-3, km, mr)
dn23:9.2: Upamāya m’idhekacce → upamāyapi idhekacce (bj, pts1) | upamāya­pi­dhekacce (s1) | upamāya­pī­dhekacce (s1, s2, km)
dn23:9.11: subbaṭṭitaṃ ubbaṭṭethā’ti → ubbaṭitaṃ ubbaṭethāti (s1-3, km) | suppaṭṭitaṃ uppaṭṭethāti (mr)
dn23:11.2: rattindivo → rattidivo (mr), mānussakaṃ → mānusakaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn23:12.12: attānaṃ na mārenti → etthantare pāṭho syā1-3, kaṃ, pā1 potthakesu
dn23:13.9: me → pitu me santako (s1-3, km), niyyādehī’ti → niyyātehīti (bj) | nīyyātehīti (pts1)
dn23:15.4: velāsikāpi → keḷāyikā pi (bj) | celāvikāpi (s1-3, km) | velāmikā (pts1)
dn23:21.4: sattho → satthavāso (s1-3, km), janapade sattho → janapado satthavāso (s1-3, km) | janapadapadeso (pts1)
dn23:21.30: opuni → opuṇi (bj) | ophuni (s1-3, km, mr), satadhā → vīsatidhā (s1-3, km)
dn23:23.69: saddhātabbaṃ → saddahātabbaṃ (bj, pts1, mr), tava → te (mr)
dn23:27.16: gila pāpadhuttaka → gilare pāpadhuttā (s1-3, km) | gili re pāpadhuttaka (mr)
dn23:32.2: dhorakāni → corakāni (s1-3, km) | therakāni (pts1), guḷavālakāni → guḷagāḷakāni (bj, mr)
dn23:32.16: pādāpi → pādāsi (mr) , samphusituṃ → phusituṃ (bj) | chupituṃ (pts1, mr)
dn23:32.22: acittīkataṃ → apaviddhaṃ (bj) | acittikataṃ (s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
dn23:34.12: pāyāsi dasamaṃ bhave → mahāvaggassa saṅgaho (bj, pts1) | mahāvaggoti vuccatīti (s1-3, km)
